title: Buddhist monk sex scandal grips Thailand as woman arrested
description: A woman has been arrested in Thailand for allegedly enticing senior monks into having sex with her and then pressuring them into making large payments to cover it up.
content:
A sex scandal has rocked Thailand's Buddhist clergy after a woman allegedly enticed a string of monks into having sex with her and then blackmailed them.
At least nine abbots and senior monks have been disrobed and cast out of the monkhood, the Royal... [2301 chars]

title: Labour MP suspended for opposing disability cuts will keep speaking for ‘invisible in society’
description: Rachael Maskell, one of four Labour MPs to lose whip, stands by actions and says party needs to be ‘broad church that listens to each other’
content:
An MP suspended from Labour for spearheading a rebellion against disability benefit cuts has stood by her actions and says she will “continue to advocate for my constituents”.
Rachael Maskell, the MP for York Central, told the BBC that Keir Starmer h... [3223 chars]

title: Ariana Grande says she's not abandoning music for film
description: The US singer insists there's still room for music after being cast in another film this week.
content:
Ariana also has a make-up business and says balancing her other projects means her music career "may not look exactly like it did before but I much prefer how it looks in my head".
"I feel grateful and excited and inspired. Finding a balance between ... [943 chars]

title: Arsenal complete world-record £1m Olivia Smith signing from Liverpool
description: The first £1m transfer in women’s football has been completed by the Canada forward Olivia Smith, who has described joining Arsenal as ‘an honour’
content:
The first £1m transfer in women’s football has been completed after the Canada forward Olivia Smith concluded her record-breaking move from Liverpool to Arsenal.
The 20-year-old has signed a four-year contract with the European champions and, althoug... [2841 chars]

title: Starmer and Merz to sign UK-Germany deal on defence and migration
description: Germany is set to tighten its people smuggling laws as Chancellor Friedrich Merz makes his first official visit to the UK today.
content:
Merz to sign deal with Starmer on migration and defence
Jamie Whitehead
Live reporter
Image source, Reuters
